name: Sleep over (SK7LL)
description:
Sleep over

After Gabriel's brother death (Kevin), Gabriel Depression and Loneliness has to be solve. So, he invited he's 2 friends  Carlisle and Matthew to have a Sleep over in his house so that they can have a time together to talk and have fun. But with the speed of time, a Shocking story must be told.

They are 2 Endings in this game.

Find the 2nd Ending to reverse the story.

⚪ Game content is for 10+

⚪ No jump scares

⚪ But with disturbing arts.

Credits:

Asset Bakery - House Tile map

Fawf art - Forest Tile map

SK7LL - Coding and Design

Have fun :)
